author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bce, depositi o/n in aumento a 677,558 mld, prestiti marginali 37 mln
text: FRANKFURT, 26 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank reported the following daily data on liquidity provision, in millions of euros. TODAY PREV Use of overnight loan facility 37 0 Use of overnight deposit facility 677,558 676,882 For additional details click here For details of previous ECB overnight lending operations, see: here For data on ECB market operations please click For Reuters calculation of money market liquidity level please click . To see graph, right-click and select 'graph' option. (Reporting by Frankfurt newsroom)
